items.sentence: Tom told me he thought that Mary was insincere.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was exhausted.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was courteous.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was bilingual.
Tom told me he thought that Mary had done that.
The dress that Mary is wearing looks expensive.
Tom has about half as many stamps as Mary does.
Tom has been sentenced to three months in jail.
Tom went to the river to get a bucket of water.
It's a miracle that Tom survived that accident.
